com.rantcrypto.cmc.api.service

Class CoinMarketCapService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rantcrypto.cmc.api.service.CoinMarketCapService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockchainService, CryptocurrencyService, ExchangeService, FiatService, GlobalMetricsService, KeyService, PartnersService, ToolsService

    @Service
public abstract class CoinMarketCapService
extends java.lang.Object
    Parent to all services which act on data from the CoinMarketCap API. Holds convenience fields and methods that are used for different API endpoints.
    Author:
    Phillip Groves

    • Method Detail

      • getResponseFromEndpoint

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> getResponseFromEndpoint(java.lang.String endpoint,
                                                                                         java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> paramMap)
        Sends a request to the CoinMarketCap REST API at the given endpoint. Endpoint string should begin with /v[version]/ (e.g. /v1/) and should not include query parameters. To include query parameters, supply a HashMap<String, String> HashMap of key-value pairs.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - Endpoint URI beginning with /v[version]/
        paramMap - Request query parameters
        Returns:
        JSON response

      • getResponseFromEndpoint

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> getResponseFromEndpoint(java.lang.String endpoint)
        Sends a request to the CoinMarketCap REST API at the given endpoint. Endpoint string should begin with /v[version]/ (e.g. /v1/) and should not include query parameters. To include query parameters, supply a HashMap<String, String> HashMap of key-value pairs.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - Endpoint URI beginning with /v[version]/
        Returns:
        JSON response

      • getFormattedParams

        public java.lang.String getFormattedParams(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> paramMap)
        Transforms a HashMap of REST endpoint query parameters into a properly formatted string of query parameters. The key of the HashMap is the key of the query parameter. The value of the HashMap is the value of the query parameter.
        Parameters:
        paramMap - HashMap of key-value pairs
        Returns:
        Formatted query parameters that can be appended to an endpoint
